title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin likes what he's seen from the Cowboys as they improve to 5-1 on the season but he's still concerned about this one thing as they pursue a Super Bowl. He discusses the Ravens dominating the Chargers and what the latest thing Lamar Jackson did to prove the haters wrong. He also tells you why he was right about Derek Carr and wrong about the Arizona Cardinals. Plus, Fox Sports NFL analyst and Hall of Famer Jimmy Johnson joins the show to explain the most impressive thing about Dak Prescott so far this season. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
